title: Definitions
context: PART II. GENERAL PROVISIONS Note Sections 502-7 and 502-8 designated as Part II and part heading amended by L 2009, c 102, ยง2(3). ยง502-7 Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Grantee&rdquo; means a party that acquires interest by way of transfer of real property. &ldquo;Record&rdquo;, &ldquo;recorded&rdquo;, or &ldquo;recording&rdquo; means the act of entering into the public records the written instruments affecting title to real property. &ldquo;Signature&rdquo; means the name of a person as written by the individual, the affixing of a mark or finger or toe print, or electronic signature as that term is defined in chapter 489E. [L 1995, c 22, ยง2; am L 2009, c 120, ยง11]
